title: Plumbe-R
text:
Introduction
Humankind invent pipes to control the everyday flow (water, air, blah! blah! blah!) in the work space. As a result Devs are makes same thing for the programming languages to make work flow smooth. I am not a developer I am a practitioner of statistics. At the beginning when I started to write codes in R, I personally not aware of this beautiful tool. I always fear about the so called piping the code.
I started writing this blogs for my own help and practicing the piping. I use several reference for this blog but I also use stack overflow as a major reference. I list down the most viewed issues in the stack overflow about the piping for my future help.

title: Who am I…
text: Presently, I am a novice research scholar at Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkata.

title: Who am I…
text:
Previously I am

A graduate student in statistics at Indian Statistical Institute, Kolkta (2019 - 2021).
A undergraduate student in statistics at Presidency University, Kolkata (2016 - 2016).
Schooling at Hare School, Kolkata (2006 - 2016).

title: Who am I…
text:
Interest
Broad portion of my mind occupied with only statistics. I mainly working with complex data structure and statistical inference on network data (synonymous with complex data). Besides statistics, I have interest in stock markets and R coding.
